attributes.action: Force resignation & prosecution of Darling, and Board of HMRC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the revelations about the huge data loss at HMRC, following insecure practices sanctioned by senior management, which show a cavalier disregard for the population's private data.

This systemic failure should result in criminal prosecution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
